ol.li: This protocol applies to all Space employees, contractors and visitors, and all operations including manufacturing facilities, technical centres, offices & administrative buildings. All sites in all regions are expected to develop site specific procedures to comply with this protocol.

Requirements of this protocol will apply to the control of hazards and risks related to the accumulation, storage, handling, use and disposal of hazardous materials. For the purpose of this protocol, hazardous materials relate to substances, mixtures, article and wastes handled, generated and stored in the workplace. Sites must comply with any applicable local legislation not specified in section 3.
